scripts.build:css: sass style.scss style.css && sass --style=compressed style.scss cleanframework.min.css
scripts.build: npm run build:css && npm run build:js && npm run build:demos
scripts.postbuild: echo 'Build complete! Ready to push to GitHub.'
scripts.version:patch: npm version patch && npm run build && npm run version:tag
scripts.version:minor: npm version minor && npm run build && npm run version:tag
scripts.version:major: npm version major && npm run build && npm run version:tag
scripts.release: npm run build && npm run version:tag
